author: kewei9453
content: Hi <@199561711278227457>, I am testing and debugging the consensus layer Caplin with Erigon, and Iâ€™d like to request some validators on devnet-6 to see how it works.

author: parithosh
content: Yeah we don't have fine grained "send api call" to subset of hosts type functionality afaik. So it would be easier if you ran a node locally or if i gave you the credentials to talk to a node's rpc directly instead of via the lb

author: parithosh

author: remyroy
content: We would like to keep devnet-5 online for testing since <https://pectra-devnet-6.beaconcha.in/> is offline and it will stays offline for at least another week. Is that possible <@199561711278227457> <@808969530608451584> ?

author: remyroy
content: Our issue is we depend on beaconcha.in APIs for the launchpad and since those aren't available for devnet-6 yet, we are getting somewhat screwed if devnet-5 dies now.

author: remyroy
content: <https://rpc.pectra-devnet-5.ethpandaops.io/> seems to be failing for many of us with MetaMask.

author: parithosh
content: yeah ofc, i can leave it up!
